catalog.name: Marine Energy Context Layers
catalog.description: This group contains marine energy layers and other layers that can be used for decisions relating to marine energy devices.

catalog.name: Analysis Tools
catalog.description: This group contains the analysis tools that operate on marine energy data.

contextItem.name: Analysis Study Area
contextItem.description: Show where it is possible to use the analytical functions of the Australian Marine Energy Atlas - the analytics will only function inside the highlighted area.
